name: GeomeTRY
description:
GeomeTRY is a simple but addicting game where you match digits or colors to geometries. All you need to do is tap the right one before the targets rush away.

Sounds easy? The developers high score is 384. Can you break the record? 

Features
- Free to play.
- Beautiful game scenes.
- Simple, but addicting game mechanics.
- Unlock 4 different game modes.
- Equip yourself with 4 different powerups that help you get higher scores.

Try it now! Experience the thrill of setting a new high score with GeomeTRY!
